definition[0]: the act of including someone or something in a larger group or set, or the fact of being included in one
example[0]: His inclusion in the team has caused controversy.
example[1]: photos chosen for inclusion in the magazine
example[2]: the inclusion of early recordings on the CD
definition[1]: someone or something that has been included in a larger group
example[3]: With the recent inclusions, there will be 28 delegates in all.
definition[2]: the act of including something as part of a larger amount or group of things
example[4]: the inclusion of cash flow information
example[5]: The agency is still reviewing two other widely used ingredients for possible inclusion in the ban.
